threads.title: I like Goodfellas especially when they do a killing

posts.content: When he does a killing on the food man and when they do killings on the plane people especially.
I like it when the man goes into the room and he thinks he is going to be made a Top Killer but there's no-one there so he says a swear and then gets done a killing on
Yes and then Spanish money man gets an anger and does a killing on a telephone box.  He was not talking Italian then he was talking punching haha lol what a cruel summer
The killings in this film are rubbish I prefer the ones in Scarface they are much funner
I'll do a killing on you you git

I saw the film Baby Driver yesterday and it is IRRESPONSIBLE!  I decided to let my baby drive me home in the film -- result: *TWO* burst airbags, a collapsed wing and a VERY EXPENSIVE EXCESS!  How can we let these Hollywood types get away with this?
